sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Start treatments in early spring or fall and continue to apply during the year to prevent and control pest populations as needed.
What pests are controlled by each product?
Ant Adios: Controls common ants, earwigs, cutworms, sowbugs, pillbugs, and crickets.
Bug Doom: Effective against ants, spiders, beetles, cockroaches, bed bugs, and more.
Mosquito Deleto: Kills mosquitoes on contact, plus repels and controls fleas and ticks. Nix Ticks: Kills ticks on contact, plus controls mosquitoes and fleas.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes! This kit complements other Sunday products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid applications, and avoid getting ant bait wet for best results.
Is there a risk of staining?
Bug Doom's main ingredient is canola oil which can potentially stain surfaces. Test spray an inconspicuous area and allow it to dry to check for possible staining before treating a larger area.
When will I see results?
Bug Doom Indoor, Mosquito Deleto, and Nix Ticks: Expect immediate impact on pests with lasting protection for up to 4 weeks when used as directed.
Ant Adios: Results within 2-4 weeks as the bait is consumed by the ant colonies.
